channel.title: Music – FLOW×GRANRODEO

item.title: FLOW×GRANRODEO - Howling ("七つの大罪 戒めの復活"OP)
item.description:
작곡: Masaaki Iizuka, Takeshi Asakawa / 작사: Kohshi Asakawa, Keigo Hayashi, Kisho Taniyama
KY: 44262

Are you satisfied?

Just open your eyes?

You can

see the light

Across

this new borderline
우치노메사레타
う/
打ちのめされた

なげ///は/
